00029         public static void getInitialCount(StringTokenizer tokens) {
00030                 int count=0;
00031                 int sampleCount=0;
00032                 while(tokens.hasMoreTokens())
00033                 {               
00034                         count++;
00035                         String token = tokens.nextToken();
00036                         if(token.contains("Sample"))
00037                         {
00038                                 count = 0;
00039                                 sampleCount++;
00040                         }
00041                         if(token.equalsIgnoreCase("up"))
00042                         {
00043                                 upArray[count] = upArray[count]+1;
00044                                 sampleData[sampleCount][count] = 0;
00045                         }
00046                         else if(token.equalsIgnoreCase("down"))
00047                         {
00048                                 downArrary[count] = downArrary[count]+1;
00049                                 sampleData[sampleCount][count] = 1;
00050                         }
00051                 }
00052         }
00053         public static void readFromFile(String filePath) {
00054                 try {
00055                         FileInputStream fis = null;
00056                         BufferedInputStream bis = null;
00057                         DataInputStream dis = null;
00058                         
00059                         
00060                         FileInputStream in = new FileInputStream("//data.txt");
00061                         //in = openFileInput("data.txt");
00062                     InputStreamReader inputStreamReader = new InputStreamReader(in);
00063                     BufferedReader bufferedReader = new BufferedReader(inputStreamReader);
00064                     StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
00065                     String line;
00066                     while ((line = bufferedReader.readLine()) != null) {
00067                         sb.append(line);
00068                     }
00069                     
00070                     
00071                         fis = new FileInputStream("data.txt");
00072                         bis = new BufferedInputStream(fis);
00073                         dis = new DataInputStream(bis);
00074                         while (dis.available() != 0)
00075                         {
00076                                 String number = dis.readLine();
00077                                 fileData+=number;
00078                                 fileData+=" ";
00079                         }
00080                         fis.close();
00081                         bis.close();
00082                         dis.close();
00083                 }
00084                 catch(Exception er)
00085                 {
00086                         er.printStackTrace();
00087                 }               
00088         }

00368         private static int TemplatesAssociationRule(String string,ArrayList<DSConn>dscon)
00369         {
00370                 int finalCounter =0;
00371                 SortedSet<String> returnSet = new TreeSet<String>();
00372                 if (string.contains("AND")) {
00373             int c=0;
00374                         c = TemplatesAssociationRule(string.substring(0,string.indexOf(" AND ")),dscon);
00375                         c += TemplatesAssociationRule(string.substring(string.indexOf(" AND ") + 5),dscon);
00376                         return c;
00377                 }
00378                 else if(string.contains("OR"))
00379                 {
00380                         int c=0;
00381                         c = TemplatesAssociationRule(string.substring(0,string.indexOf(" OR ")),dscon);
00382                         c+=TemplatesAssociationRule(string.substring(string.indexOf(" OR ") + 4),dscon);
00383                         return c;
00384                 }
00385                 else if(string.contains("SizeOf"))
00386                 {
00387                         StringTokenizer st1 = new StringTokenizer(string);
00388                         st1.nextToken();
00389                         st1.nextToken();
00390                         int ruleBodyInt = Integer.parseInt(st1.nextToken().toString());
00391 
00392                         if (string.contains("SizeOf(BODY)")) 
00393                         {
00394                                 StringTokenizer st = new StringTokenizer(string,">=");
00395                                 st.nextToken();
00396                                 int number = Integer.parseInt(st.nextToken().trim());
00397                                 for(int i=0;i<dscon.size();i++) {
00398                                         DSConn ds = dscon.get(i);
00399                                         if((ds.body.size())>=number) {
00400                                                 printData(ds);
00401                                                 finalCounter++;
00402                                         }
00403                                 }
00404                         }
00405                         else if (string.contains("SizeOf(HEAD)"))
00406                         {
00407                                 StringTokenizer st = new StringTokenizer(string,">=");
00408                                 st.nextToken();
00409                                 int number = Integer.parseInt(st.nextToken().trim());
00410                                 for(int i=0;i<dscon.size();i++) {
00411                                         DSConn ds = dscon.get(i);
00412                                         if((ds.head.size())>=number) {
00413                                                 printData(ds);
00414                                                 finalCounter++;
00415                                         }
00416 
00417                                 }
00418 
00419                         }
00420                         else if (string.contains("SizeOf(RULE)"))
00421                         {
00422                                 StringTokenizer st = new StringTokenizer(string,">=");
00423                                 st.nextToken();
00424                                 int number = Integer.parseInt(st.nextToken().trim());
00425                                 for(int i=0;i<dscon.size();i++) {
00426                                         DSConn ds = dscon.get(i);
00427                                         if((ds.body.size() + ds.head.size())>=number)
00428                                         {
00429                                                 printData(ds);
00430                                                 finalCounter++;
00431                                         }
00432                                 }
00433 
00434                         }
00435                         else {
00436                                 System.err.println("##FORMAT ERROR##");
00437                         }
00438                 }
00439                 else
00440                 {
00441                         String itemString = string.substring(string.lastIndexOf("(") + 1,string.lastIndexOf(")"));
00442                         ArrayList<String> itemSet = new ArrayList<String>();
00443                         StringTokenizer st = new StringTokenizer(itemString, ",");
00444                         while (st.hasMoreElements())
00445                         {
00446                                 itemSet.add(st.nextToken());
00447                         }
00448 
00449                         int numberCondition = 0;
00450                         st = new StringTokenizer(string);
00451                         st.nextToken();
00452                         st.nextToken();
00453                         String tempString = st.nextToken();
00454                         if (tempString.equals("ANY")) {
00455                                 numberCondition = -2;
00456                         } else if (tempString.equals("NONE")) {
00457                                 numberCondition = -4;
00458                         } else {
00459                                 numberCondition = Integer.parseInt(tempString);
00460                         }
00461                         int type =0;
00462                         if(string.contains("RULE")) {
00463                                 type=1;
00464                         }
00465                         if(string.contains("BODY")) {
00466                                 type=2;
00467                                 System.out.println("inhere");
00468                         }
00469                         for(int i=0;i<dscon.size();i++) {
00470                                 DSConn ds = dscon.get(i);
00471                                 ArrayList<String>toBeChecked = new ArrayList<String>();
00472                                 if(type==0) {
00473                                         toBeChecked.addAll(ds.head);
00474                                 }
00475                                 if(type==2) {
00476                                         toBeChecked.addAll(ds.body);
00477                                 }
00478                                 if(type==1) {
00479                                         toBeChecked.addAll(ds.body);
00480                                         toBeChecked.addAll(ds.head);
00481                                 }
00482                                 boolean present = false;
00483                                 int counter = 0;
00484                                 for(int a=0;a<itemSet.size();a++) {
00485 
00486                                         for(int b=0;b<toBeChecked.size();b++) {
00487                                                 if(itemSet.get(a).equals(toBeChecked.get(b)))
00488                                                 {
00489 
00490                                                         present = true;
00491                                                         counter++;
00492                                                 }
00493                                         }
00494                                 }
00495                                 if(!present && numberCondition==-4) {
00496                                         printData(dscon.get(i));
00497                                         finalCounter++;
00498                                 }
00499 
00500                                 else if(present && numberCondition==-2) {
00501                                         printData(dscon.get(i));
00502                                         finalCounter++;
00503                                 }
00504                                 else if(present && numberCondition==counter) {
00505                                         printData(dscon.get(i));
00506                                         finalCounter++;
00507                                 }
00508 
00509                         }
00510                 }
00511                 return finalCounter;
00512         }
